skills.desc: Attacks all enemies. Places two 5% [Poison] debuffs for 3 turns. This debuff cannot be resisted.
skills.name: Grim Reaper

skills.desc: Deals damage from all [Poison] debuffs on all enemies instantly.
skills.name: Bane

skills.desc: Immune to [Stun], [Freeze], [Sleep], [Provoke], [Block Active Skills], [Block Passive Skills], [Fear], [True Fear], [Petrification] debuffs. Also immune to HP exchange effects, HP balancing effects, and cooldown increasing effects.
skills.name: Almighty Immunity [Passive]

skills.desc: Damage from Continuous Damage decreased by 60%.
skills.name: Continuous Damage Resistance II
